mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (P_SEQ, G_SEQ, M_SEQ, P_COST, P_NUM, P_DATE, P_NAME, P_CONTS, P_IMG, P_MEET,P_FLAG,P_REGDATE, P_RFLAG) VALUES (PAY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{g_seq},#{m_seq}, #{p_cost},#{p_num},#{p_date}, #{p_name},NULL,NULL, NULL,0,SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.P_SEQ, p.G_SEQ, p.P_NAME, g.G_NAME,g.G_THUMBIMG, p.P_DATE, p.P_COST, p.P_NUM FROM PAY p, GOODS g WHERE M_SEQ=#{m_seq} AND P_FLAG=1 AND p.G_SEQ=g.G_SEQ ORDER BY P_REGDATE DESC
SELECT p.P_SEQ, p.G_SEQ,p.P_NAME, g.G_THUMBIMG, p.P_DATE, p.P_COST, p.P_NUM , p.G_SEQ, p.P_FLAG FROM PAY p, GOODS g WHERE M_SEQ=#{m_seq} AND P_FLAG=0 AND p.G_SEQ=g.G_SEQ ORDER BY P_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (P_SEQ, G_SEQ, M_SEQ, P_COST, P_NUM, P_DATE, P_NAME, P_CONTS, P_IMG, P_MEET,P_FLAG,P_REGDATE, P_RFLAG) VALUES (PAY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{g_seq},#{m_seq}, #{p_cost},#{p_num},#{p_date}, #{p_name},NULL,NULL, NULL,1,SYSDATE, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY SET P_FLAG=1 WHERE P_SEQ=#{p_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT p.P_SEQ, p.G_SEQ, p.P_NAME, g.G_THUMBIMG, p.P_DATE, p.P_COST, p.P_NUM FROM PAY p, GOODS g WHERE p.P_SEQ=#{p_seq} AND p.P_FLAG=1 AND p.G_SEQ=g.G_SEQ ORDER BY p.P_REGDATE DESC

SELECT p.P_SEQ, p.G_SEQ, p.P_NAME, g.G_THUMBIMG, p.P_DATE, p.P_COST, p.P_NUM, m.M_EMAIL, m.M_NAME, p.P_REGDATE FROM PAY p, GUIDE gu, GOODS g, MEMBERS m WHERE m.M_SEQ=p.M_SEQ AND g.GU_SEQ = gu.GU_SEQ AND gu.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} AND p.P_FLAG=1 AND p.G_SEQ=g.G_SEQ ORDER BY P_SEQ DESC
